Translations.Text: los-ui baegseongdo seonjijadeul-eul bujeonghaess-euni
geudeul-ui hyeongje los-i geudeul-egemalhaessdeola neohuineun hananim-i dulyeobji anhneunyo
naneun neohuileul wihan mid-eum-ui seonjijala
hananim-eul dulyeowo hago na-ege sunjonghala
geulo inhayeo naega bosang-eul yoguhaji anhnani sillo naui bosang eun man-yuui junim-eulobuteo issnola
neohuineun ujuui modeun pijomul gaundeseo namseong-egeman jeobgeunhalyeo ha neunyo
hananimkkeseo neohuileul wihae changjohasin neohui baeujadeul-eul beolyeo du lyeo haneunyo sillo neohuineun hangyeleul neom eoseon baegseongdeul-ila
geudeul-i daedabhagil los-iyeo nega dannyeomhaji anhneundamyeon neoneun chubang danghaneunja jung-e issge doelila
geuga daedabhadoe sillo naneun neohuiui haeng-wileul jung-ohanola
juyeo jeowa jeoui gajog-eul geu deul-i haenghaneun geos-eulobuteo guhayeo jusoseo
geulihayeo hananim-eun geuwa geuui gajog moduleul guwonhago
dwie nam-aissdeon neulg-eun han yeo ingwa
daleun jadeul-eul myeolmangke haessnola
geudeul oee dol ubag-eul peobu eoss-euni i dol ubag-eun gyeong-goleul geoyeog han baegseong-ege naelyeojin geos-ila
sillo i an-eneun hanaui ye jeung-i iss-euna geudeul daedasuneun midji ani hayeossdeola
sillo geudaeui junim-eun gwonneung-gwajabilo chungmanhanola
mediyan-ui baegseongdeuldo seonji jadeul-eul bujeonghaess-euni
syuaibeuga geudeul-ege mal haessdeola hananim-i dulyeobji anhneunyo
naneun sillo neohuileul wihan mid eum-ui seonjijala
hananim-eul dulyeowohago na-e ge sunjonghala
geulo inhayeo naega bosang-eul yoguhaji anhnani sillo naui bosang eun man-yuui junim-eulobuteo issnola
jeoul-eul gongjeonghage hayeo bujeong eulo tain-ege sonsil-eul kkichiji malla
gyunhyeong-i doedolog mugeleul dalla
salam-ui jeongdanghan gwonlileul bolyu haji malmyeo jisang-e haeag-eul peotteuli ji malla
